item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Chaotic-land Chaotic-land
item.description:
@Chaotic-land wrote:

Hello there.
I’ve tried to make a yell commands only allows
donators & staff to yell, normal pepoles have to wait 30secounds.
I’m pretty new in coding, so i need alittle help on my way.

Here is the code:

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
try {

				if(Connection.isNameMuted(c.playerName)) {
					return;
				}
				
				String yelled = playerCommand.substring(5);
				if(yelled.contains(":duelreq:") || yelled.contains(":tradereq:")) {
					return;
				}
				if(yelled.length() <= 0) {
					return;
				}
				String rank = "";
				if(c.donator > 0)
					rank = "@blu@[@red@Donator@blu@]";
				if(c.playerRights > 0) {
					String[] ranks = {
						"", "@blu@[@gre@Mod@blu@]", "@blu@[@yel@Admin@blu@]", "@blu@[@yel@Admin@blu@]",
					};
					rank = ranks[c.playerRights];
				}
				if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastYell > 30000) {
					c.lastYell = System.currentTimeMillis();
					for(Player p : PlayerHandler.players) {
						if(p != null) {
							Client all = (Client) p;
							all.sendMessage(rank + "" + c.properName + ": @bla@" + Character.toUpperCase(yelled.charAt(0)) + yelled.substring(1, yelled.length()));
						}
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("You can only yell every 30 seconds.");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) { 
			}
		}
	}
}

}

	[/code]

Read full topic
